CustomField.description: Indicates the category of insurance or service associated with the task. This helps categorize and prioritize tasks based on the nature of the follow-up or customer interest.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the type of insurance or service this task is related to: • ACA New – New Affordable Care Act inquiry or application • Personal Lines – Home, auto, or other personal insurance lines • Commercial Lines – Business or commercial insurance products • Medicare New – New Medicare-related inquiry or enrollment • T65 - 4 Months Out – Prospect approaching 65 years old in 4 months (Medicare preparation)
CustomField.label: Type
